name: UCommonRichTextBlock
doc: Text block that supports custom scaling for mobile platforms, with option to only show icons if space is sparse.

bTintInlineIcon: Toggle it on if the text color should also tint the inline icons.
MobileTextBlockScale: Mobile font size multiplier. Activated by default on mobile. See CVar Mobile_PreviewFontSize
ScrollStyle: References the scroll style asset to use, no reference disables scrolling
bIsScrollingEnabled: If scrolling is enabled/disabled initially, this can be updated in blueprint
bAutoCollapseWithEmptyText: True to automatically collapse this rich text block when set to display an empty string. Conversely, will be SelfHitTestInvisible when showing a non-empty string.
